item.title: France summons US ambassador over 'unacceptable' letter about antisemitism
item.description: He wrote to Macron alleging France did not do enough to combat antisemitism.

item.title: How Hurricane Katrina shaped these New Orleans educators
item.description: Hurricane Katrina changed New Orleans' education system forever, creating the first all-charter school district in the U.S. The Associated Press spoke...

item.title: US heat wave smothers Pacific Northwest, poses extreme risk in California and Arizona

item.title: Beaches reopen in New York and North Carolina after Hurricane Erin
item.description: New York and North Carolina have begun reopening beaches that had been closed due to Hurricane Erin

item.title: Texas Gov. Abbott vows to approve GOP-leaning congressional voting map
item.description: Texas Gov. Greg Abbott has promised to sign a new congressional voting map designed to help Republicans maintain their slim majority in Congress
